summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1244, for the improvement of Seventeenth Avenue North, from East Galer Street to East Prospect Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt, by constructing brick gutters, concrete curbs with granite corners, together with all necessary water mains and sewers and their necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13622 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
